issues.title: <html> element must have a lang attribute
issues.description: Ensure every HTML document has a lang attribute

any.message: The <html> element does not have a lang attribute

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  The <html> element does not have a lang attribute

issues.title: The html element should have a lang or xml:lang attribute which describes the language of the document.
issues.description:
<html><head>
<title>Expertise Finder<...</html>

original_issue.message: The html element should have a lang or xml:lang attribute which describes the language of the document.

issues.title: `<html>` element does not have a `[lang]` attribute
issues.description: If a page doesn't specify a `lang` attribute, a screen reader assumes that the page is in the default language that the user chose when setting up the screen reader. If the page isn't actually in the default language, then the screen reader might not announce the page's text correctly. [Learn more about the `lang` attribute](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/html-has-lang).

node.explanation:
Fix any of the following:
  The <html> element does not have a lang attribute

issues.title: Document should have one main landmark
issues.description: Ensure the document has a main landmark

all.message: Document does not have a main landmark

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix all of the following:
  Document does not have a main landmark

issues.title: All page content should be contained by landmarks
issues.description: Ensure all page content is contained by landmarks

any.message: Some page content is not contained by landmarks

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Some page content is not contained by landmarks

automatic.name: Headings; Wrong Order, Empty & Missing Headings;

issues.title: Page should contain a level-one heading
issues.description: Ensure that the page, or at least one of its frames contains a level-one heading

all.message: Page must have a level-one heading

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix all of the following:
  Page must have a level-one heading

automatic.name: Size; Target Size; Element too small

issues.title: Touch targets do not have sufficient size or spacing.
issues.description: Touch targets with sufficient size and spacing help users who may have difficulty targeting small controls to activate the targets. [Learn more about touch targets](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/target-size).

node.explanation:
Fix any of the following:
  Target has insufficient size (93.4px by 17px, should be at least 24px by 24px)
  Target has insufficient space to its closest neighbors. Safe clickable space has a diameter of 22px instead of at least 24px.
